summary.description:
Connecting omics signatures of diseases, drugs, and mechanisms of actions with iLINCS.

This repository consists of set of exeamples to showcase the ways of interacting with iLINCS API. The examples are implemented in the RStudio notebook usingIlincsApis.Rmd and the "knitted" html output of the notebook is provided in usingIlincsApis.html.

||| COMMON LINK WITH (PUB. & NAME DIFFERENT) bio.tools/GREIN (ILINCS.ORG)
summary.name: iLINCS
